channel.title: Can somebody tell me how to get p-hats and full drag plz?
channel.description: can anybody tell me codes r full drag or where tehy r?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 07:29:40 PM[/size][hr]please anybody?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 07:30:03 PM[/size][hr]whenver i click open the items thing under hybrid thing it says windows does not know how to open this file blah blah blah[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 07:32:21 PM[/size][hr]and how do u play with other ppl?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 07:33:03 PM[/size][hr]plz anyone?

item.title: Can somebody tell me how to get p-hats and full drag plz?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_J Mod J
item.description:
@Mod_J wrote:

type “::pickup (item number) (amount)” and hit enter.

red p hat = 1038
yellow p hat = 1040
blue p hat = 1042
green p hat = 1044
purple p hat = 1046
white p hat = 1048

d med = 1150
d chain = 3140
d legs = 4087
d square = 1188

Read full topic
